oai:www.clarin.si:11356/1064;2018-10-24T20:54:37Z;hdl_11356_1023;hdl_11356_1024;Croatian web corpus hrWaC 2.1;Ljubešić, Nikola;Klubička, Filip;web corpus;tagging;lemmatisation;The Croatian web corpus hrWaC was built by crawling the .hr top-level domain in 2011 and again in 2014. The corpus was near-deduplicated on paragraph level, normalised via diacritic restoration, morphosyntactically annotated and lemmatised. The corpus is shuffled by paragraphs. Each paragraph contains metadata on the URL, domain and language identification (Croatian vs. Serbian).

Version 2.0 of this corpus is described in http://www.aclweb.org/anthology/W14-0405. name: 96101676-5343-5181-8035-089ed5655748
notes:
The Croatian web corpus hrWaC was built by crawling the .hr top-level domain in 2011 and again in 2014. The corpus was near-deduplicated on paragraph level, normalised via diacritic restoration, morphosyntactically annotated and lemmatised. The corpus is shuffled by paragraphs. Each paragraph contains metadata on the URL, domain and language identification (Croatian vs. Serbian).

Version 2.0 of this corpus is described in http://www.aclweb.org/anthology/W14-0405. Version 2.1 contains newer and better linguistic annotations.
title: Croatian web corpus hrWaC 2.1
